name: spark
description: Apache Spark is a unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing. Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/spark/2.7.0-2.4.0/
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 1 agent node with: 1 CPU | 1024 MB MEM
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Spark is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/spark/2.7.0-2.4.0/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes:
The Apache Spark DC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/spark/2.7.0-2.4.0/uninstall/ to clean up any persisted state.
